text: @PayZen_Healthcare Affordability Crisis: A Wake-up Call for Change! 🚨💡 New report highlights the harsh reality of healthcare in America - many can't afford it! 💸🤕 Average max payment is $97, causing skipped/delayed preventive care, prescriptions, mental health, and diagnostic testing. 🙅‍♀️ We need solutions NOW! 🔍 What are your thoughts?
